file.name: Correspondence.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Correspondence
  description: This service domain orchestrates the production of pre-formatted correspondence and batches of correspondence (e.g. mail shots).
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/Correspondence/10.0.0
paths:
  /Correspondence/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - CorrespondenceOperatingSession
      summary: InCR Initiate the correspondence operational facility
      description: InCR Initiate the correspondence operational facility
      operationId: Initiate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitiateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - CorrespondenceOperatingSession
      summary: UpCR Update settings and details of the operating session (e.g. change priorities)
      description: UpCR Update settings and details of the operating session (e.g. change priorities)
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CorrespondenceID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/Execute:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - CorrespondenceOperatingSession
      summary: ExCR Execute an automated task (e.g. statistical analysis)
      description: ExCR Execute an automated task (e.g. statistical analysis)
      operationId: Execute
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CorrespondenceID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ExecuteCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExecuteCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - CorrespondenceOperatingSession
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about the correspondence session
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about the correspondence session
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CorrespondenceID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RetrieveCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/Outbound/Initiate:
    post:
      tags:
      - BQ - Outbound
      summary: InBQ Initiate processing an outbound correspondence item
      description: InBQ Initiate processing an outbound correspondence item
      operationId: InitiateOutbound
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CorrespondenceID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InitiateOutboundRequest'

        400:

        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:

        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/Outbound/{outboundId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - Outbound
      summary: UpBQ Update details of an outbound correspondence item
      description: UpBQ Update details of an outbound correspondence item
      operationId: UpdateOutbound
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/CorrespondenceID'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/OutboundID'

        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/UpdateOutboundRequest'

        429:

        500:

        500:

  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/OutboundWithResponse/Initiate:

      tags:

        429:

        500:

  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/OutboundWithResponse/{outboundwithresponseId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - BQ - OutboundWithResponse
      summary: UpBQ Update details of an outbound correspondence with tracked response
      description: UpBQ Update details of an outbound correspondence with tracked response
      operationId: UpdateOutboundWithResponse

        500:

  /Correspondence/{correspondenceId}/OutboundWithResponse/{outboundwithresponseId}/Retrieve:
    get:

        400:

        401:

        403:

        404:

        429:

components:
  schemas:
    CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceServiceSessionStatistics:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceServiceSessionReport:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
          type: string
    BlockMailing:
      type: object
      properties:
        BlockmailingRecord:
          type: string
    Outbound:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceSourceReference:
          type: object
        CorrespondenceRecord:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceType:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceTemplateReference:
          type: object
        CorrespondenceTemplateRecord:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceContent:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceMedia/Channel:
          type: string
        CorrespondenceAddressee:
          type: string
        CustomerReference:
          type: object
        ChannelAccessPreferenceReference:
          type: object
        ChannelAccessPreferenceProfile:
          type: string
        ChannelAccessChannel/DeviceType:
          type: string
        ChannelAccessChannel/DeviceTypePreference:
          type: string
        ProductandServiceType:
          type: string
        Employee/BusinessUnitReference:
          type: object
        DateType:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    Inbound:
      type: object
      properties:
        InboundCorrespondenceInstanceReference:
          type: object
        InboundCorrespondenceRecord:
          type: string
        InboundCorrespondenceType(e.g.unsolicitedmessage,product/servicerelated,complaint):
          type: string
        InboundCorrespondenceContent:
          type: string
        InboundCorrespondenceAddressee:
          type: string
        InboundCorrespondenceCustomerReference:
          type: object
        InboundCorrespondenceEmployee/BusinessUnitReference:
          type: object
        DateType:
          type: string
        Date:
          type: string
    OutboundWithResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        ResponseDueDate:
          type: string
        ResponseCorrespondenceReference:
          type: object
        ResponseCorrespondenceRecord:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    InitiateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
    InitiateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionStatistics:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
              type: string
    UpdateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest:

      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionStatistics:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
              type: string
    UpdateCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:

          properties:

            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
              type: string
    ExecuteCorrespondenceOperatingSessionRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
    ExecuteCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
              type: string
    RetrieveCorrespondenceOperatingSessionResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        CorrespondenceOperatingSession:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionStatistics:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionReportType:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceServiceSessionDate:
              type: string
        Outbound:
          type: object
          properties:
            CorrespondenceSourceReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceRecord:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceType:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceTemplateReference:
              type: object
            CorrespondenceTemplateRecord:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceContent:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceMediaOrChannel:
              type: string
            CorrespondenceAddressee:
              type: string
            CustomerReference:
              type: object
            ChannelAccessPreferenceReference:
              type: object
            ChannelAccessPreferenceProfile:
              type: string
            ChannelAccessChannelOrDeviceType:
              type: string
            ChannelAccessChannelOrDeviceTypePreference:
              type: string
            ProductandServiceType:
              type: string
            EmployeeOrBusinessUnitReference:
              type: object
            DateType:
              type: string
